segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the precarious setup in the center of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is attempting quite an acrobatic feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems to be rocking back and forth; I'm certain it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand deep inside a "COOKIE JAR," pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This daring act is happening right behind the oblivious woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm starting to feel quite anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling from that height makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine surprise he hasn't tumbled already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's entirely focused on the cookies, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a risk he is taking for a sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
